query:
ALTER TABLE users 
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS subscriptionTier ENUM('free', 'starter', 'pro', 'unlimited') DEFAULT 'free' NOT NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS stripeCustomerId VARCHAR(64),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS stripeSubscriptionId VARCHAR(64),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS subscriptionStatus ENUM('active', 'canceled', 'past_due', 'trialing', 'none') DEFAULT 'none' NOT NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS dailyQueries INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS dailyQueriesResetAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS lastQueryAt TIMESTAMP NULL;

ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS subscriptionTier ENUM('free', 'starter', 'pro', 'unlimited') DEFAULT 'free' NOT NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS stripeCustomerId VARCHAR(64),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS stripeSubscriptionId VARCHAR(64),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS subscriptionStatus ENUM('active', 'canceled', 'past_due', 'trialing', 'none') DEFAULT 'none' NOT NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS dailyQueries INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS dailyQueriesResetAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS lastQueryAt TIMESTAMP NULL;
